text:
I used to open ChatGPT 30+ times a day. 

Now I use these AI for images, writing, searching:

1. Claude 4.5-Opus to write.
2. Grok-4.1-Thinking to search.
3. Perplexity for market research.
4. Gemini (Nano+Veo) for images and videos.
5. Use this prompt guide: https://lnkd.in/dUFKX9jg.

1. Claude 4.5-Opus to write.

☑ Use custom styles.
☑ Search before writing.
☑ Here's a prompt example:

Prompt: "You're my research lead for "How to AI" newsletter. Find my next NL topic. What works: Counterintuitive AI findings (like my hit on rudeness improving ChatGPT), major launches the week they drop, hidden feature deep-dives, contrarian takes with data.
Search: This week's AI news with viral potential Arxiv for surprising LLM papers, Underreported OpenAI/Anthropic/Google/Meta announcements, Emerging AI controversies. 
Deliver 10 options, each with:
Topic (2-5 words), Angle (the hook), Source (link), Why it fits (one sentence)
Prioritize "I didn't know that" over obvious news."

2. Grok-4.1-Thinking to search.

☑ The only AI that can search through Twitter.
☑ The most accurate AI to find relevant news.
☑ More prompts: https://lnkd.in/dUFKX9jg.

Prompt: “Act as a public opinion researcher. Your goal is to gauge polarized views on a hot-button issue, defining success as categorizing 30+ X posts into pro/con/neutral buckets with engagement metrics, backed by web snippets for context. Employ X semantic search with a query like ‘debate on [topic]’ excluding biased sources, and web search with snippets for ‘site:reddit.com [topic] OR site:news.com [topic]’.”

3. Perplexity for market research.

☑ The one AI made to search.
☑ It has most of the LLMs inside, like ChatGPT.
☑ I like the "Discover" tab, a better Google News.

Prompt: "Analyze [topic] in [timeframe], delivering data-driven insights and quantitative forecasts. Cover [key aspects], compare [variants], and provide actionable recommendations. Structure output with an executive summary and clear sections, citing all sources."

4. Gemini (Nano+Veo) for images and videos.

☑ The best AI to make both images and videos.
☑ Nano-Banana vibecheck: https://lnkd.in/dZ96-CFS.
☑ Prompt for infographic: https://lnkd.in/dh6g5MNd.
☑ Prompt for pro headshot: https://lnkd.in/d5YBitjd.

5. Copilot to do nothing. Delete it.

I'll save you some time. It's the worst of them all.
You use it because your company forces you to.
